meanings.definition: A category of artistic composition, as in music or literature, characterized by similarities in form, style, or subject matter.
meanings.sent1: In the world of music, jazz is a popular genre.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys reading books in the mystery genre.
meanings.sent3: The comedy genre always makes me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the fantasy genre is like entering a magical realm.
meanings.sent5: The horror genre can send shivers down your spine.

meanings.definition: A particular style or category of works of art.
meanings.sent1: His paintings fall under the abstract genre.
meanings.sent2: The film industry has various genres like action and romance.
meanings.sent3: The landscape genre in art captures the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent4: Her poetry belongs to the romantic genre of literature.
meanings.sent5: The genre of impressionism uses light and color in unique ways.
